definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The scope of private international law rests with the social needs.
sentences.chinese: 国际私法的范围应当根据实际的需要来加以确定。

sentences.english: Evasion of law is very important in private international law.
sentences.chinese: 法律规避在国际私法居于重要地位。

sentences.english: Directly applicable law is a new system in international private law.
sentences.chinese: 直接适用的法是国际私法中一项新的制度。

sentences.english: Preliminary question is a common system problem in private international law.
sentences.chinese: 先决问题是国际私法中的一个一般制度问题。

sentences.english: However, there is no well-defined body of private international law.
sentences.chinese: 但是，目前还没有对国际私法作出很好的界定。

sentences.english: In private international law, the legal nature of conflicts has always been of concern for scholars.
sentences.chinese: 国际私法中法律冲突的性质，向来为学者们所关注。

sentences.english: "Law of direct application" is an important category of international private law.
sentences.chinese: “直接适用的法”是国际私法的一个重要范畴。

sentences.english: On legal conflict and application of intellectual property right;
sentences.chinese: 国际私法中法律冲突的性质，向来为学者们所关注。

definition: criminal procedure/abbr. for 刑事訴訟法|刑事诉讼法
